H0.text: During which year was Washington DC declared the capital of the USA. 1776

H1.text: During which year was Washington DC declared the capital of the USA. 1787

H2.text: During which year was Washington DC declared the capital of the USA. 1789

H3.text: During which year was Washington DC declared the capital of the USA. 1790

A4.text: The Residence Act of 1790 authorized the establishment of the District of Columbia as the site for the capital of the United States.
